summary: I RECEIVED A NOTICE ON OCTOBER, 2016 THAT THERE MIGHT EXIST A DEFECT TO MY MAZDA CX-7 2011 MODEL WITH THE FRONT SUSPENSION LOWER ARM BALL JOINT FITTING DURING DRIVING.  I HAVE NOT RECEIVED A NOTICE TO HAVE A REPAIR DONE.  I FEEL THAT IT MAY BE UNSAFE TO DRIVE Y CAR.  WHY IS MAZDA CORPORATION ALLOWED TO TAKE SO LONG IN ADDRESSING THIS ISSUE?
